message: Starting Phase 2 review: Checking implementation deliverables for state_db migration
Reviewing prior findings and examining actual source files to verify Phase 2 deliverables
Examining state_db.py to verify get_agents_for_task and get_agent_by_id function implementations
Verifying database schema and testing API endpoints - checking for created_at error
Forming verdict - SQLite working, migration complete with proper fallback pattern

Review completed. VERDICT: APPROVED. Phase 2 implementation meets all success criteria: agents.py and phases.py both use SQLite-first pattern with JSON fallback. Direct testing confirms state_db functions work correctly (26 agents, 3 phases returned). Phase advanced to Phase 3: Verification.
